item.title: A look into composing, Composability, Immutability
item.description: An ordinary work day, I’m adding a feature to our JavaScript driven tables so it can pull/push data while navigating between the pages(I belive in common tongue they call this "pagination"). I wrote two functions named retrieveItems and drawItems. As I’m building the retrieveItemsAndDraw function, this is what I find myself writing: const retrieveAndDrawItems = R.compose(drawItems, retrieveItems) At that time one of the guys in my team creep up behind me and ask what I’m up to, and what that line does.

item.title: About Me
item.description: The blog is written primarily for the Turkish speaking audience. My e-mail: aec \\@ mm \\. st
